Text.val: 14.08.2012 JH SCR17500 Replaced activation of Excel via batch file with GB323 - ActivateExcel
28.04.2011 SH SCR16428 Replaced GB002 by GB902
05.02.2009 GB SCR Small technical change for UniPaaS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (count(*) as decimal(9,0)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBB, :1/DEBC where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select DEBC_CLCURR, cast(sum(coalesce(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT,0)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null group by DEBC_CLCURR for fetch only optimize for 100 rows;

Text.val: Recalclulate only if currecny different from GNRL_CURRENCY
Add currency total to group total

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DCMO, :1/DEBC where DCMO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMO_YEAR = :2 and DCMO_CURRENCY =':3' and DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = :4 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
